original:
This strategy enhances the ability to selectively analyze low-abundance constituents through direct targeting. Enzyme activity can be monitored by tracking converted substrates. Identifying enzyme substrates presents significant challenges in proteomics and is crucial for understanding signal transduction pathways within cells.

A developed method employs "analog-sensitive" kinases to label substrates using an unnatural ATP analog. This
